data: You can use Bootstrap classes like card or pt-5 in the markup (components, routes, app.html).
You can customize your Bootstrap theme with variables like $primary or $grid-breakpoints in src/variables.scss.
The @popperjs/core package is installed to satisfy bootstrapâ€™s peer dependency on it. You can safely ignore it, or uninstall it if you can do so without introducing package manager errors.
